body_html:
...but this only supports CUDA 7.5. I already updated to 8.0 when I saw TF supports it now.

However, one can also compile from source or use the nightly wheels from github in order to install RC1 (scroll down to "Installation"):

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow

body:
...but this only supports CUDA 7.5. I already updated to 8.0 when I saw TF supports it now.

However, one can also compile from source or use the nightly wheels from github in order to install **RC1** (scroll down to "Installation"):

```
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
```
